code: import"./App.css";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[photo,setPhoto]=useState("");const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{getPhoto();},[]);async function getPhoto(){setIsLoading(true);const res=await fetch("https://api.nasa.gov/planetary/apod?api_key=DEMO_KEY&count=1");const data=await res.json();setPhoto(data[0]);setIsLoading(false);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:photo.url,alt:photo.title,class:"bgImg"}),isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"loader",id:"loader"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Get A Random Astronomy Photo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:photo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"caption",children:photo.explanation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"copy",children:photo.copyright}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"copy",children:photo.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:getPhoto,children:"Get Another Photo"})]})]});}export default App;
